channel.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
channel.description: This is my first sword so please post constructive criticism, Thanks ;) Side View [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/20qmlwy.jpg[/img] Side View Wire Frame [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zq4qjm.jpg[/img] Top View [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2i8ce44.jpg[/img] Top View Wire Frame [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/255189j.jpg[/img] Character Wield View [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2cqjn29.jpg[/img]

item.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

You used Primes, your already ahead of most of the new modelers.

Read full topic

item.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
item.dc:creator: @I_Java_I I Java I
item.description:
@I_Java_I wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:24, topic:414513”]Try not to take pictures of your wireframes at an angle next time. The pommel is just a general mess when trying to look at it, though I presume it is pretty clean.
There was one unneeded loopcut in your hilt and you did the edge of your blade wrong. Other than that, nice job! I love the color-shading and hope to see more from you soon.

[/quote]
The pommel actually is clean, it looks like that because of the gem in the middle and you will see more after my computer is fixed or i get a new one (before or after X-mas)

Read full topic

Thats pretty cool bro

There was one unneeded loopcut in your hilt and you did the edge of your blade wrong. Other than that, nice job! I love the color-shading and hope to see more from you soon.

I will be posting the plate body after my laptop gets fixed but for now I guess I can’t make any further progress on the models sawwy

item.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Try not to take pictures of your wireframes at an angle next time. The pommel is just a general mess when trying to look at it, though I presume it is pretty clean.
There was one unneeded loopcut in your hilt and you did the edge of your blade wrong. Other than that, nice job! I love the color-shading and hope to see more from you soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
item.dc:creator: @noobicus noobicus
item.description:
@noobicus wrote:

[quote=“I Java I, post:22, topic:414513”][quote author=noobicus link=topic=516480.msg3750065#msg3750065 date=1315959933]

would be a great custum on a delta,good job!

This is awesome… could you release this? and iwouldnt just add it for looks with no stats… i just thought up somr good uses and actually putting it in a plot…

This is why you shouldn’t.

like i said… i plan on actually giving it a purpose in a storyline… not adding it in as “FULL SERBER CONEOM AGS 99 HIT SPECUL ATEK”…

Customs ruin servers. Fact.

Like i said though, because of the way people implement them and use them… they put it in with no purpose, just a new item thats usually just overpriced with no effect… just a really high bonus…
[/quote]
Please stay on topic and just to make a statement custom models do ruin servers although some people may like them.[/quote]
Sorry, and I won’t lie, people do make it so they ruin servers… but its because they use them all in the wrong way…

Read full topic

item.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
item.dc:creator: @I_Java_I I Java I
item.description:
@I_Java_I wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:19, topic:414513”][quote author=I Java I link=topic=516480.msg3750019#msg3750019 date=1315958916]

would be a great custum on a delta,good job!

This is awesome… could you release this? and iwouldnt just add it for looks with no stats… i just thought up somr good uses and actually putting it in a plot…

This is why you shouldn’t.

like i said… i plan on actually giving it a purpose in a storyline… not adding it in as “FULL SERBER CONEOM AGS 99 HIT SPECUL ATEK”…

Customs ruin servers. Fact.

Thanks for all the positive comments, I don’t think I will release it though I don’t really have the time to upload anything. Thanks rip4d for the criticism although I’d wished I would have more criticism from other users, oh well guess it’s my turn, the blade’s to short and the hilt wire frame needs to be fixed.
[/quote]
It’s pretty basic, there isn’t much to fix up. Try something a little more complex, I wanna see how far you can push your skills.[/quote]
Well I’m almost finished with the plate body but i haven’t decided the colors on it and it lacks detail. but after I’m finished with it all would you have ideas for a new model?

Read full topic

This is why you shouldn’t.

like i said… i plan on actually giving it a purpose in a storyline… not adding it in as “FULL SERBER CONEOM AGS 99 HIT SPECUL ATEK”…

Customs ruin servers. Fact.
[/quote]

Thanks rip4d for the criticism although I’d wished I would have more criticism from other users, oh well guess it’s my turn, the blade’s to short and the hilt wire frame needs to be fixed. ;)[/quote]
It’s pretty basic, there isn’t much to fix up. Try something a little more complex, I wanna see how far you can push your skills.

Read full topic

item.title: Desert Scimmy (My First Sword)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:11, topic:414513”]Because adding models doesn’t make the server any better, Normally it makes it worse.[/quote]My thunder set was sexy and you know it :x

OP
This is pretty good for a first, especially so considering its actually neat. I never see that in first models. Only advice is to maybe add more detail to it? I don’t see anything wrong with the structure at all, which is normally where I give criticism So yeah, excellent job. I can’t wait to see what else you make.

Read full topic

Well, I figured I could make a set, what do you think?

please don’t[/quote]
